channel.title: Laravel on Hello World
channel.description: Recent content in Laravel on Hello World

item.title: Laravel MVC Starter
item.description:
This starter is the starting point of laravel 5 MVC project. This application is meant to be used as a starting place for those looking to get their feet wet with laravel.

Overview of project

BDD ( Business domain design)

+-------+ 0...*     0...* +--------+ 1     0...* +---------+ 
| tag   | --------------- |  blog  | ----- ----- | comment |
+-------+                 +--------+             +---------+           
                               | 1...*
                               |
                               | 0...*
                          +--------+ 
                          |  like  |
                          +--------+

Structure of starter

Screenshots

Browse Repository
